value:
$WmMPID_舞踏リネア,ch10_19_Linnea_F_Dance19,Face|Lord Berkut! This way—hurry!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ベルクト,ch10_14_Berkut_M_Dance19,Face|You needn't rush, Rinea. The dance
floor will be present all night...$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏リネア,ch10_19_Linnea_F_Dance19,Face|But even one second feels too
long to wait when we finally have
a chance to dance together!$k$pIt's like a dream come true... I can
hardly believe other worlds throw
such wonderful balls!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ベルクト,ch10_14_Berkut_M_Dance19,Face|Hm. Yet I find myself...reluctant.$k$pWould His Majesty not prefer I crush
his enemies on the battlefield over
performing some silly dance?$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏リネア,ch10_19_Linnea_F_Dance19,Face|But...my lord...$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ベルクト,ch10_14_Berkut_M_Dance19,Face|...Oh, never mind. We did not intend
to be summoned to this world, after
all. We can do as we will for now!$k$pNow, shall we put our splendor on
display for the collected peasantry?$k$pTake my hand, Rinea. Let's go.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏リネア,ch10_19_Linnea_F_Dance19,Face|Gladly, my lord!$k$p

$WmMPID_舞踏リネア,ch10_19_Linnea_F_Dance19,Face|Oh, this song...$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ベルクト,ch10_14_Berkut_M_Dance19,Face|Ah! The finale is upon us! The ball
is drawing to a close.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏リネア,ch10_19_Linnea_F_Dance19,Face|Yes, I suppose it is...$k$pTime enjoyed passes too quickly.$k$pI wish that this festival never had
to end, so we could keep dancing
on and on...$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ベルクト,ch10_14_Berkut_M_Dance19,Face|To tell the truth, my aching feet are
telling me I've danced enough for a
lifetime—or more.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏リネア,ch10_19_Linnea_F_Dance19,Face|O-oh...really?$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ベルクト,ch10_14_Berkut_M_Dance19,Face|Well, I know you, Rinea... You need
no festivals to justify dancing—just
the song in your heart.$k$pAnd should you wish it, I shall always
answer your call for a dance partner.
You need only speak the words.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏リネア,ch10_19_Linnea_F_Dance19,Face|M-my lord...$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ベルクト,ch10_14_Berkut_M_Dance19,Face|Even as I grow old, I will always
be there for you, Rinea...$k$pI refuse to shrivel into some pitiful
bag of bones, too crooked to even
stand, let alone dance...$k$pNo! I shall lead you in dance until
the very moment I am called into
the heavens above.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏リネア,ch10_19_Linnea_F_Dance19,Face|Oh, Lord Berkut...$k$pI understand, and I will gladly follow
your lead. My greatest wish is that
we might dance together forever.$k$pEven should I be carried into the
brilliance of heaven or dragged into
the very depths of hell...$k$pLet us clasp our hands and step
boldly forward—no matter what
may try to pull us apart.$k$p
